$$
E_{KS}[n] = \overbrace{T_s[n] + E_{Ne}[n] +  {\color{purple} {E_{ee}^{classical}[n]}}}^\textit{known functionals} + \overbrace{{\color{purple} {E_{ee}^{XC}[n]}}}^\textit{unknown functionals}
$${#eq-functional}

$E_{XC}$ includes:

- Exchange and correlation energy
- Correction of kinetic energy term $\Delta T_{s}[n]$
